abstract: Vivien Schweitzer reviews performance by opera tenor Joseph Calleja at Le Poisson Rouge.
snippet: Joseph Calleja is among a few Metropolitan Opera stars to venture downtown to Le Poisson Rouge, wooing a packed house with selections from “The Maltese Tenor.”
lead_paragraph: Joseph Calleja is among a few Metropolitan Opera stars to venture downtown to Le Poisson Rouge, wooing a packed house with selections from “The Maltese Tenor.”

headline.main: Robust Voices, Celebrated on a Small Stage
headline.print_headline: Robust Voices, Celebrated on a Small Stage
headline.seo: Joseph Calleja at Le Poisson Rouge - Review
